name: BLOCK ENGINEER
description:
A block engineering sandbox. Use the blocks as components for your creations. 

Please play it and give feedback.

COMING SOON: Puzzle Rooms.

Ever since seeing logic gates and computer simulations in Minecraft, I've been intrigued with the idea of creating a game centered around these concepts. I'm also a lover of all Zachtronics games and Factorio, so those are a big inspiration for this project.

Test yourself! It's possible to make these 4 logic gates: 

  • OR
  • AND
  • NOT 
  • XOR
